attributes.action: Early vote out of the EU
attributes.additional_details:
Refugee massing at our borders 
Being told we have to take them in
attributes.background:
Early vote out of EU give Britain back to Britain 
To make our country strong again 
No more EU decisions our way or no way

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105863

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
